uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui

Class ItemPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.ItemPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ItemPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    ItemPanel class which inherits from JPanel holds several arrayList, button and List objects to show the different Menus and passing data on to the Order and OrderPanel using the DataManager class and it methods
    Author:
    stk4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  ItemPanel.AddItem
      inner class that implements ActionListener reacts when the "Add" button is pressed pass data about the selected object to the DataManager class
      (package private) class  ItemPanel.LoadDrinksMenu
      inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Drink" button is pressed calls the loadDrinkMenu() method
      (package private) class  ItemPanel.LoadPizzaMenu
      inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Pizza" button is pressed calls the loadPizzaMenu() method
      (package private) class  ItemPanel.LoadSidesMenu
      inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Sides" button is pressed calls the loadSidesMeny() method
      (package private) class  ItemPanel.SizeButtonListener
      inner class which implements ActionListener reacts to changes on the JRadioButtons
